info.name: Invidious (All Instances) Player And Tabs v.3
info.description:
Player stay fixed at the LEFT side.
 - Title moved TOP of player
- Videos Related / Infos,Descrpition / Comment on the RIGHT side ( visible on hover their own tabs)
So, you can watch the video AND read infos / Comments, choose next video without problem.
- Related Videos panel highlight on hover
- Top Nav compact
 - Footer and Settings / Info for the video, visible on hover
- Support Dark and Light theme
info.additionalInfo: About Invidious (in French): Invidious : Regarder des vidéos Youtube sans les pubs ! And its official site: Invidious Invidious is an open source alternative front-end to YouTube. - Support for all Instances - Invidious API documentation repository see to: Invidious - Select Instances Changes v.3: - Normalize the video height of the video play. - Support for Message from Instance (moved bottom under player), by example: [Message Bottom] Joan baez - sings with dylan-1963, 1982.(7 de 9) - Support some Alternate design, by example: [Alternate Design] Joan baez - sings with dylan-1963, 1982.(7 de 9)
